abstract: On a slow Thursday of network television, a repeat of “CSI” gave CBS the most watched hour of the night as 9 million viewers tuned in to the crime drama at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

lead_paragraph: On a slow Thursday of network television, a repeat of “CSI” gave CBS the most watched hour of the night as 9 million viewers tuned in to the crime drama at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘CSI’ Anchors Another Win For CBS
